moves.name: Zing Zap
moves.effect: Has a moderate chance of making the target flinch.

moves.name: X Sp. Def
moves.effect: Sharply raises the user’s Sp. Def.

moves.name: The Power of Science!
moves.effect: Drastically raises the user’s Attack and Speed. Sharply lowers the user’s Defense.

syncMove.name: Whiz Kid Gigavolt Havoc
syncMove.description: Its power increases if the target is flinching.

passives.name: Endurance
passives.description: If the Pokémon enters battle with full HP, allows it to endure the next hit it takes that would reduce it to 0 HP.
